title: 48-hour Maintenance Commitment, 9' ceilings, Brand New Hardwood Floors
posting_body: ['YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', "Conveniently located in Westminster, Colorado, halfway between Denver's central business district and Boulder County and ensconced against breathtaking and idyllic mountain scenery, Westcliff Apartments will not disappoint!", "Featuring one, two and three bedroom apartment homes with stainless steel appliances, upgraded kitchens and the largest square footage in the area, Westcliff is Westminster's premiere apartment community.", 'Call or visit us today!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Vaulted Ceilings on Upper Floors', 'Crown Molding Accented with Two-tone Paint', 'Library & Reading Lounge', 'Newly Redesigned Kitchens', 'Short-Term Lease Available', 'Built-in Bookcases', 'Wine Room', 'Attached and Detached Garages Available', '48-hour Maintenance Commitment', 'Game Room', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Full-size Washer and Dryer Included', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
